settings.title: Settings
settings.favoriteClubsInfoTooltip: Search for clubs and add them to your favorites. Click a club to set it as your home club.
settings.favoriteClubsSelectHomeHint: Select home club by clicking it once.
settings.favoriteClubsAlreadyAdded: This club is already in your favorites.
settings.favoriteClubsAddError: Failed to add club to favorites.
settings.favoriteClubsRemoveError: Failed to remove club from favorites.
settings.favoriteClubsPlaceholder: Your favorite clubs will appear here.
settings.adminClubsPlaceholder: Clubs you administrate will appear here.
settings.adminClubsUpgradeRoleToast: Please upgrade your role to add or manage clubs.
settings.deleteAccountPlaceholder: To delete your account click the delete button. Please remember this action cannot be reversed.
settings.deleteAccountConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. You will be logged out and will need to sign up again to use the service. This action cannot be undone.
settings.deleteAccountSuccess: Your account has been deleted successfully.
settings.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

auth.whatDoesSignInMean: What does sign in with Apple or Google mean?
auth.signInExplanation: Signing in with Apple or Google still gives you the option to use a different name and email with this app. You share no other information with this app than the email and name you enter this time.
auth.appleSupportLink: Manage your apps with Sign in with Apple - Apple Support
auth.appleSupportDescription: When you use Sign in with Apple, you can use your Apple Account to sign in to participating apps and websites from developers other than Apple. Learn how to view and manage the apps that you use with Sign in with Apple.
auth.googleAccountLink: Third Party Sign in with Google - Google Account
auth.googleAccountDescription: Third party login allows you to sign in with Google across multiple apps & sites. Stop password tracking & use your Google Account for a simpler sign in.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.subtitle: Complete your profile to get started
signup.name: Name

manageClub.title: Manage Clubs
manageClub.noClubs: You don't administrate any clubs yet. Add clubs from Settings.
manageClub.ruleDrag: Drag users to change default admin
manageClub.ruleDefault: Top user is always the default
manageClub.selectClubToManage: Select a club from the list to manage its admins and organisers.
manageClub.searchUserPlaceholder: Search user by name or email...
manageClub.roleHint: You can change it later too.
manageClub.selectUserFirst: Please search and select a user first.

about.title: About
about.allowsYouToItem4: Schedule games according to player skill level
about.howToUseItem1: Sign in using Google or Apple ID
about.howToUseItem2: Find or add your club under "Clubs" in Settings
about.howToUseItem3: Add your club as "Home Club" (now tournaments can be filtered on distance from your home club)
about.howToUseItem4: You become administrator of clubs you add
about.howToUseItem5: Only the administrator can organise tournaments for your club
about.howToUseItem6: You can change or add administrators for your club by <link>Contacting Us</link>.
about.glicko2Paragraph: Glicko-2 is a rating system that improves upon the EloÂ² system. It accounts for rating deviation and volatility. Deviations are shown at 95% confidence level.
about.glicko2Credit1: Glicko-2 was developed by Mark E. Glickman, Senior Lecturer on Statistics at Harvard University
about.glicko2Credit2: Elo was developed by Arpad Elo, a Hungarian-American physics professor
